name: Dirt Bike Racing PRO: Trial Extreme Moto X Rider
name_original: Dirt Bike Racing PRO: Trial Extreme Moto X Rider
description:
The most thrilling dirt bike racing game is here now with a brand new look in a PRO version. NO ADS! 100% COMPLETE GAME!

Buckle up for extreme motocross racing with crazy stunts action. Play for extreme mayhem and adrenaline filled bike racing adventure to become an ultimate trial bike rider. Race, jump and crash your mad rivals to become the last moto racer in offroad trial bike madness. Enjoy uninterrupted (ad free) gameplay on impossible racing tracks.

Experience the thrill of handling monster bike assault and drive through variety of treacherous tracks. Explore the uncharted territories with rugged terrain and bumpy roads. Launch yourself as a competitive biker and race dirt bikes head to head in action packed motorbike game. Take dirt bike racing challenge to fight, throw, smash and kick out mad rivals to cross the finish line first. Wreck your opponents motorbike and show mad skills to be the ultimate motocross champion. Hit the nitro boost throttle to ride fast, race with extreme mayhem and cross the finish line first. Overcome obstacles and perform extreme bike stunts on dangerous offroad race tracks. Launch off an enormous jump, land on motorcycle hot wheels and crash into rivals. Enjoy demolition derby gameplay combined with moto bike circuit racing.

Game Features:
20 levels to complete in 2 racing modes and a knockout round
Unlock unique dirt bikes for utmost motorbike riding
Bike crashing modes: Racing Mode, Survival Pit & Knockout Round
Detailed models with realistic motorbike physics
Immersive sounds and smooth controls
High speed race & realtime motorcross jumping

Enjoy the unique gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve our games in future releases.
